title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions and more.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models; drop-in LLM and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-like web UI for Ollama with chat history, model switching and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive terminal client for Ollama with syntax highlighting and REPL.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL for chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, fine-tuning and deployment patterns.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models to any server.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted note writing powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to integrate Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks adding GPU support, Open-WebUI, and Postgres chat persistence.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with tokio and serde.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama instances.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming.
